casebody.data:
IN RE: E.M. 46P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2019 Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, for E.M.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Marie Hartwell Evitt, Attorney at Law, Tammera S. Hill, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of February 2019 by Respondent for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of March 2019."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 18th day of March, 2019 to Respond to Petition for Discretionary Review.
